title: Game Character Human AI Sound Effects
description: Deploy a humanized robot side-kick voice in your next game audio production with AAA Game Character Human AI, a bright & fun collection of modernized human voice over sound files created for sci-fi games & trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Demo


This voice-over sound library features a male protagonist game character inspired by games like Fallout, Halo & Apex. Humanized AI

Deploy a humanized robot side-kick voice in your next game audio production with AAA Game Character Human AI, a bright & fun collection of modernized human voice over sound files created for sci-fi games & trailers. This voice-over sound library features a male protagonist game character inspired by games like Fallout, Halo & Apex.


Over 335+ Sounds

AAA Game Character Human AI voiceover sound library provides you with more than 335+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, battle cries, custom character specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, character, and outstanding gameplay audio experiences.


Cohesive Dialogue for Story Building

AAA Game Character Human AI voiceover sound effects is not only packed with high-quality voice recordings but includes thought out, cohesive scripted dialogue and vocalizations to help you build dynamic sci-fi stories, game trailers, in-game characters, dramatic moments and so much more.
technicalDetails:
Product details:

  • 338 Human-AI voice-over audio files
  • 460.1 MB of voice samples
  • Includes 44.1k/16bit
  • Includes Soundminer Metadata
  • AAA Game Character Voice-Over Sound Effects Library
  • Perfect for space, sci-fi, & fantasy games, film and movie trailers
  • 10 battle cries
  • 6 breathing files
  • 5 coughing recordings
  • 15 sad crying sounds
  • 122 immersive character-specific dialogue lines – like don’t push my buttons, gizmo-box is tingling, silly humans
  • 25 fighting vocalizations
  • 26 vocalizations
  • 6 laughing sounds
  • 23 pain & death vocals
  • 100 stock dialogue lines – like hello, farewell, alright
  • All Royalty Free
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)


Number of Audio Waves: 338

Number of Audio Cues: 338

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 13

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
